sentence.Network_en: Upon hearing what had happened, Indra vowed to take back the life - giving liquid.
sentence.Network_cn: 听说了所发生的事后, 因陀罗发誓要取回生命的甘泉.

sentence.Network_en: As though the water that spurted and bubbled among its stones, was indeed a life - giving spring.
sentence.Network_cn: 仿佛那在石雕中汩汩喷流的水真是生命之泉.

sentence.Network_en: Happiness is often misty, spraying us the life - giving rain abstemiously.
sentence.Network_cn: 幸福常常是朦胧的, 很有节制地向我们喷洒甘霖.

list.abs: christ is the life - giving spirit ., 基督是赐生命的灵.
的意思是『给予生命』(give life)，表示人类的后裔要『从夏娃而出』。此后，人生下来，就需要取个『名字』。

means.word_mean: 1. giving or having the power to give life and spirit;
